backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling contact form submissions with storage, retrieval, marking read, and deletion.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking logo‑replacement feature to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing brief summaries of all major frontend components and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining color tokens, dark mode overrides, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app assembling header, sections, footer, and toaster into a single-page layout.
frontend/src/components/site/ContactForm: Validated contact form component with client-side checks and submission via React Query.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Ab: About section describing mission, community, and approach using icon‑based value cards.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Co: Contact section wrapper providing heading, description, and the ContactForm component.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/He: Landing hero section with tagline, description, CTA buttons, and a featured image with smooth scroll behavior.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Pr: Displays three program cards with icons, descriptions, and tags for tech workshops, challenges, and outreach.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Te: Renders a team grid with avatar initials, names, roles, and short bios.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Wh: Shows three core pillars with images, titles, and descriptions using a simple grid layout.
Footer with updated logo, quick navigation links, social icons, and attribution link.
Fixed header with updated logo, scroll navigation, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for Internet Identity authentication, including identity loading, login, and logout handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines queries for fetching all or unread contact submissions using the backend actor.
Mutation hook that submits contact form data and invalidates submission-related queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light and dark mode color variables and base/global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point mounting React with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, extended theme tokens, custom colors, fonts, shadows, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, image requirements, and pending feature requests for the INNO YOUTH website.
